document.full_text: the german finance ministry has come up with a model for a new aid package for greece that would include the voluntary participation of private creditors, welt am sonntag newspaper reported on saturday.
document.title: germany has plan for greece private creditors: report
lines_and_colors: the german finance ministry has come up with a model for a new aid package for greece that would include the voluntary participation of private creditors, welt am sonntag newspaper reported on saturday.
